mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDYROOM (STUDYROOM_ID, STUDYROOM_NAME, STUDYROOM_PRICE, STUDYROOM_NUM, STUDYROOM_SIZE, STUDYROOM_STRUCTURES, STUDYROOM_INFO, BRANCH_ID) VALUES (#{study_id},#{studyroom_name}, #{studyroom_price}, #{studyroom_num}, #{studyroom_size}, #{studyroom_structure}, #{studyroom_info}, #{branch_id)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STUDYROOM ORDER BY STUDYROOM_ID
